Header: Schools will not be closed tomorrow
Content: Chairman of the National Free Teachers Association, SudanthaRatnayake states that the planned trade union action of some Teachers Associations will be futile. SudanthaRatnayake said that though speculations are doing rounds teachers will work as usual tomorrow. He expects more than 70 percent of teachers will be represent tomorrow as per their surveys. Minister AkilaVirajKariyawasam said that the education sector should not be used on behalf of political victimization. The Education Minister made this appeal at a media conference organized to raise awareness on the false report that was published in a national newspaper under the headline “All Schools will close on 04th of this month.”He also queried whether schools can be closed in a manner to meet the needs of others. In the same newspaper there is an editorial saying that Akila should go to school again. He said that this matter was not to be questioned.
